description:
At the start of battle, your {CLASS_Life} creatures gain [icons,1972]Rune of Lua.

Rune of Lua: Target takes a large amount of damage, caster recovers {STAT_health} equal to 50% of the damage dealt, and the caster's on-attack effects are activated. 100% of this spell's damage is based on the caster's highest stat.
name: Rune of Lua
